posts._title: Aldo Lado – L’ultimo treno della notte AKA Last Stop on the Night Train AKA Night Train Murders (1975)
posts.title: L’ultimo treno della notte
posts.excerpt: Synopsis:Margaret and Lisa, high school friends, take the night train from Germany to Verona to spend Christmas with Lisa’s family. They flirt mildly with male passengers, including two randy delinquents in their 20s, Blackie and Curly. The four of them end up in a first-class cabin with a well-dressed woman of about 30 who has …

posts.title: Nasser 56

posts._title: Leslie Libman & Larry Williams – Brave New World (1998)
posts.title: Brave New World
posts.excerpt: In the future, humanity has been genetically engineered into four classes, ranging from the decision-making Alphas to the worker class Drones. The notion of individual relationships is outdated and people are encouraged to seek pleasure with anybody else. The use of the drug Soma, which provides instant happiness, is widespread. posts.title: Mama, ich lebe
posts.excerpt: Four young Germans in a Soviet POW camp decide to join the Red Army to hasten the end of the war. posts._title: Sergio Martino – Tutti i colori del buio AKA All the Colors of the Dark (1972)
posts.title: Tutti i colori del buio
posts.excerpt: Synopsis:Jane lives in London with Richard, her boyfriend. When she was five, her mother was murdered, and she recently lost a baby in a car crash. She’s plagued by nightmares of a knife-wielding, blue-eyed man. Richard, a pharmaceutical salesman, thinks the cure is vitamins; Jane’s sister Barbara, who works for a psychiatrist, recommends analysis; a …
posts.titleEnglish: All the Colors of the Dark

posts._title: Jean-Luc Godard – À bout de souffle AKA Breathless (1960) (HD)
posts.title: À bout de souffle
posts.excerpt: SYNOPSIS:Petty thug Michel panics and impulsively kills a policeman while driving a stolen car. On the lam, he turns to his aspiring journalist girlfriend Patricia, hiding out in her Paris apartment. When Patricia learns that Michel is being investigated for murder, she begins to question her loyalties.

posts._title: Emil Loteanu – Tabor ukhodit v nebo AKA Gypsies Are Found Near Heaven (1976)
posts.title: Tabor ukhodit v nebo
posts.excerpt: Rada, a beautiful and very proud gipsy girl is used to steal men’s hearts and monk them. Zobar is a horse thief who’s heart is stolen by Rada and his mind is bewitched. He is ready to give up his freedom but not his pride.
